title.nl: Stel Power Regulator Mode (P) niveau in

titleFormatted.en: Set Power Regulator Mode (P) level to [[set_power_regulator_mode]]
titleFormatted.nl: Stel Power Regulator Mode (P) niveau in [[set_power_regulator_mode]]

hint.en:
*P* Setting power regulator mode level. Read the manual before changing. 
Range: 0-10 
Default: 2
hint.nl:
*P* Stel de Power Regulator mode niveau in. Lees de handleiding voordat deze instellingen aangepast worden. 
Bereik: 0-10 
Standaard: 2.
